channel.title: Deployment Example :: K-State CS Textbook Extras

item.title: Instructions
item.description: Setup Dev Container Follow the steps on this page to create a new devcontainer and GitHub Codespace: https://textbooks.cs.ksu.edu/cis526/x-examples/01-express-starter/01-codespace/index.html. Choose the Node.js & PostgreSQL container type with Node version 22-bookworm. Setup Server Follow the steps on this page to create a new Express server: https://textbooks.cs.ksu.edu/cis526/x-examples/01-express-starter/02-express-starter/index.html Use the npm-check-updates comamnd to update all installed packages. Environment Install dotenvx as shown on this page: https://textbooks.cs.ksu.edu/cis526/x-examples/01-express-starter/07-environment/index.html Add to top of app.js require('@dotenvx/dotenvx').config() Create .env file with these contents:
